name: pdf-ocr-parser
description: Parse PDFs and images via OCR provider client for text extraction, table extraction, and metadata retrieval. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: pdf_ocr_parser
toolDefinition.description: Parse PDFs and images via OCR for text extraction, table extraction, and metadata retrieval. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: parse_pdf (OCR a PDF file), parse_image (OCR an image file), extract_tables (extract tables from PDF), get_metadata (get PDF metadata), list_languages (list supported OCR languages)

file.description: File URL or path. Required for parse_pdf, parse_image, extract_tables, and get_metadata.

pages.description: Pages to process: "all", a single number (e.g. "3"), or a range (e.g. "1-5"). Optional, defaults to "all".

language.description: OCR language as ISO 639-1 code (e.g. "eng", "fra", "deu"). Optional, defaults to "eng".
